Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Villa Flamenca in Nerja, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Burriana Beach and Carabeo Beach. This hotel is within close proximity of Nerja Beach and Balcon de Europa.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 126 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Burriana Beach - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Carabeo Beach - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Nerja Beach - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Balcon de Europa - 1 km / 0.6 mi

Chanquete's Boat - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Torrecilla Beach - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
El Playazo Beach - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Nerja Caves - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi

Ferrara Beach - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
El Morche Beach - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi
La Herradura Castle - 11.3 km / 7 mi
Pena Escrita - 11.8 km / 7.4 mi
Ornitologico Loro Park - 16.1 km / 10 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Villa Flamenca is Malaga (AGP) - 55.8 km / 34.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
